summary: Diff shows `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` was heavily modified and two additional non-requested project metadata files were updated. Because `AppV1.jsx` content is truncated, the diff summary does not provide enough evidence to confirm a verbatim V51 overwrite or the presence of all required V51 engines/flows, nor that only minimal mechanical fixes were applied.

missing_requirements.requirement: Completely delete the current contents of `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` and replace the entire file with the exact user-provided V51 “NEXUS VIRAL (Growth & Conversion)” code block (verbatim overwrite), including the four engines and cinematic dark luxury UI styling.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows only a truncated portion of `AppV1.jsx`, so it cannot be verified that the file is an exact verbatim overwrite of the user-provided V51 block, nor that all four engines (navigator.share, WhatsApp deep-link booking, Swiss ZIP↔city suggestions, dark luxury styling) are present as coded.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the project compiles and runs after the V51 overwrite by applying only minimum mechanical adjustments required by the repository, without changing intended V51 UI/styling/copy/behavior.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary does not include build output and `AppV1.jsx` is truncated, so there is insufficient evidence that changes were strictly mechanical, that the app compiles, and that Landing/Client/Pro navigation works without runtime crash.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added project metadata/state documentation not requested in the BuildRequest (frontend file summaries and project state JSON).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to overwrite `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` with V51 code and apply minimal mechanical build fixes. It does not request updating repository summary/state files.
